welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Crowborough, the charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in all the beauty and culture this lovely town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The newer and larger terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The original terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium high-speed WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport offers a comfortable and modern environment for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Centre
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private jet passengers, offering VIP services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
